articles.title: Hegseth warns China poses 'imminent' threat to Taiwan and urges Asia to boost defence - BBC
articles.description: The US defence secretary called on Asian countries to boost spending and work with the US to deter war.
articles.content:
Tessa WongReporting from
Shangri-la Dialogue, Singapore
The US defense secretary warned that China poses a real threat to Taiwan
US Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth has warned of China posing an … [+8768 chars]
